Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2007 07:44PM Isabel89 wrote: I am having a bilateral mastectomy and reconstruction w tissue expanders in two weeks. I look at pictures of women post op and try to imagine how I will feel waking up, but can't wrap my mind around it. It is reassuring to hear that a number of women were able to just take tylenol, maybe the pain is manageable?
Posts.Title: Pain from Mastectomy and Scarring SusanB12 wickednice
